Content.Text:
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Here we are. This is the land that you
have now taken on. You may use it
however you like.
<PAGE>
As it belongs to you, why don't you give
it a name?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, <GREEN><MYFARM></GREEN> Farm? That's a fine name.
I like it!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Still... it hasn't been touched in a
number of years. It's pretty wild.
<PAGE>
After hearing that you were coming we
all worked together to clean up the
house and garden.
<PAGE>
The land still needs all these rocks,
branches and weeds dealt with, though.
That's the place to start, I think.
